modName: Hellcommanders TR Basic needs and skymomod patch
summary: Patches a small number of food items (that are in potion section or if I find es-ware with food tag) in Skymods esm file
descriptionHtml:
Name: Hellcommander\'s TR-Basic Needs & RWS Patch
Version:
Date: 4/17/2012
Category: Miscellaneous
Requirements: Player-Created MOD(s): Real Wildlife Skyrim 0.1.esp and TRO_BasicNeeds.esp
Author(s): Patch made by Hellcommander711
Source:

Description
===========
My own simple patch so Skymomod food items can effect hunger level etc with TRO_BasicNeeds


Details
=======
Of changes food items for Skymomod.esm as following:
Boar Meat given raw
Boar Roast given medium
Dagon Testicles given default food drink effect and raw food (it had 2 effects healing both stamina and health have not tested ei made because someone asked)
Gaur meat given raw meat effect
parasite meat given raw meat effect
Scamp skin given raw meat effect

If authors of mods this makes match want me to take down I will.
Plans:
Patch anymore items that are considered food by game to have total realism effects
make new cooking recipes that are missing? (no cooked gaur meat that I can see don\'t think lore says it is edible raw)
This is a patch I created by myself.

1.Extract somewhere
2.Place in your data folder of Skyrim
3.Use your favorite modding tool to place after TR-Basic Needs & Real wildlife in the following order:
Skymomod.esm
TRO_BasicNeeds.esp
Total Realism and SkyMomod patch.esp

Uninstall
=========
1. Uncheck TR-Basic Needs & RWS Patch.esp with whatever mod manager you use.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.



Upgrade
=======
Only changes effect so if I ever change the mod their shouldn\'t be any problems I aim for mods I make to have the least conflicts and problems I can.

Incompatibility
===============
Incompatible with any mod that changes the food/potion category items added by Skymod esm

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
No issues at time of writing that I know of.

History
=======
1.0, 04/22/12- Initial release.

Contact
=======
Post any comments on the comment section.

Credits
=======
All credits for content go to author of skyrim monster mod and author of (Total Realism - Basic Needs)

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Creation Kit
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Wrye Bash - http://wrye.ufrealms.net/Wrye%20Bash.html

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but don\'t complain to me if it
doesn\'t work or your PC blows up.
Any of the mod authors of the 2 mods it uses to patch can place on their mod page and maintain if they want.
author: Patch Created by Hellcommander711
